Reviews.Title: Made a great investment
Reviews.Author: Khristanda Cooper
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical when I first ordered it. BUT I needed a knew phone asap. So I went for it. And after a week of waiting it came. and let me tell you. Its a great phone. Still trying to figure out how to screen capture. but I haven't had any issues yet. It charges fast. Connects to your service well. Still waiting on a case to see how it fits. but everything is the same as a note except the camera is on the left. other than that great phone. Call quality is clear. Music and headphones is clear. the speaker is clear and loud. Just a really great phone

Reviews.Title: love the phone.
Reviews.Author: Bethany P.
Reviews.Content: Love the phone. Didn't realize it would be so big but its awesome. One problem is that I can't find a phone case or screen protector to fit it.

Reviews.Title: most probably the best I ever had
Reviews.Author: Maurizio Di Pasquale
Reviews.Content: I had 3 different android and this seems to be really the best.The PEN does the job. Don't expect to write but when you navigate in the web really helps in the small Tab.Never locked, wi-fi works great, BT no problem either as phone or music. Display great, clear and bright.Battery life is standard. It takes around 1 week to start to be efficient.Fast with all the apps. Definitively suggested as product.Dual SIM, didn't try yet overseas but here works.Rgds

Reviews.Title: I really love this product
Reviews.Author: Kellin S.
Reviews.Content: It's a great product for its price. It's beatiful, large good screen. Android 4.2 . Runs smooth. It brings two batteries, a screen protector, a plastic cover and flip cover-like case, not great quality but it's ok.  Got a bunch of pre-installed apps.About the stylus, it makes not much a sense, i rather use my fingers and it has no special software for it (Like the real note) but its nice, a special touch.It's one GB for apps and 1.65 free. Which it's ok.  You really need  an extra micro SD card.  You insert both sims cards and start working.

Reviews.Title: kinda disappeared!!!
Reviews.Author: Liannie T.
Reviews.Content: I am a little disappointed because I can't get no phone covers for this phone. I try Amazon I try eBay I try other websites and because is a replica of the galaxy note 2 there is no covers. That is a very negative issue I can't also get no 3g coverage The speaker phone you can hardly hear it. Internet slow...

Reviews.Title: This Phone ROCKS
Reviews.Author: C. Hart "CRYSTAL"
Reviews.Content: This phone rocks, I love it. I just put in my Tmobile Sims card and it went right to work. Would not ask for better. I recommend this Note 2 to anyone. Great job...

Reviews.Title: This Is A Nice Phone!
Reviews.Author: chrissy
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these phones, one for me and one for my mom. We both agree that the phones are nice. I love the quality of the camera. I had no problem setting up my SIM card, I just popped it in the slot and put in my memory card and it connected right away. I use T-Mobile prepaid service. I just logged into my Gmail account and everything popped right up. I barely use the stylus pen but it works great. I love my phone.... Thanks TigerKing Electronics!

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked world GSM phone. 3G - 850/2100, 2G -850/900/1800/1900. Compatible with at&t;, T-Mobile, Straight Talk, Simple Mobile and other GSM networks. Please make sure your SIM card is not locked with PUK code
3G - 850/2100 bands. Fully compatible with at&t;, stright Talk & Net10 at 2G/3G. compatilble with T-Mobile & Simple Mobile at 2G. For Straight Talk, Trac fone, Simple Mobile or Net 10 will requires a manual APN setup
Free Tether - Use your 3G data service as a WiFi hot spot and connect your notebook, ipad or other device for free. No need to pay monthly tether fee
DUAL SIM CARD SLOT.BOTH ARE STANDARD SIM CARD SLOT
ProductInfo.Name: uleFone N9189 Note 2 Smartphone Quad Core 5.3inch Android 4.1.2 OS 3G WCDMA/GSM w/ Dual Camera 5.0MP AFt/1GB RAM/GPS/AGPS/Pen Stylus Ivory White
